Html:
Hi All,

I have created the region with Expander user control and it is looking like a stack which contains multiple expander. I want to reorder the User control inside the region with DragDropManager. Is it possible to do with prism Framework? Can you please guide me on this?

Thanks and Regards,

Sakthi

Hi,

As far as I know there is no guidance about using the DragDropManager for views or regions in Prism. So far, the only sample I have seen that applies drag and drop functionality to move views between different regions can be found in the following blog post:

  • How to: Drag and Drop WPF Views between Regions in Prism-v2

Perhaps, you could find it useful, as a starting on how to tackle this kind of scenarios.

Additionally, you could also check the following related resources:

  • Drag and Drop with MVVM
  • MVVM with Drag & Drop
  • Drag & Drop and modifying Width via mouse while using MVVM - Databinding

Regards,

Agustin Adami
http://blogs.southworks.net/aadami
